title: Arcade1Up Cabinets: Pac-Man And Mortal Kombat Classic Editions In Stock For $334

description:
Are you looking to unlock all the Psychic Power Bomb expansions in Metroid Prime 4: Beyond? The ability itself is acquired fairly late in the campaign, but it's quite useful to have. With it, you can blow up obstacles and barriers that are otherwise impenetrable.

Note that the Psychic Power Bomb is a Power Suit ability that comes from the Great Mines region. You need to defeat the Omega Griever boss to claim it as your reward. By default, you only have three charges, which can be replenished if you find pick-ups or rest at save points. But, with the help of our guide, you can obtain five additional upgrades so you can roll around wh
title: All Psychic Power Bomb Expansions In Metroid Prime 4: Beyond

description:
A lot of games get spotlight at The Game Awards, but that doesn't mean that publishers are holding off on delivering plenty of exciting game announcements outside of the show. Among those participating in the industry's biggest week are the folks at Double Fine Productions and iam8bit, who just hosted their semi-annual Day of the Devs showcase.

During the hour-long event, we got a look at 21 games from a variety of independent and smaller-scale studios. Regardless of whether you're looking for a quirky platformer, atmospheric puzzle game, charming life sim, or just some good ol' fashioned psychological horror, it's safe to say that this showcase had something for you. From Beastro and Big Hops to Mirria and Lucid Falls, here are the games announced at 2025's Day of the Devs s
title: The Game Awards 2025: Everything Announced At Day Of The Devs
mClassic Graphics Upscaler For Retro Gaming & Switch Discounted To Lowest Price Ever

description:
Rockstar Games has released a new statement regarding the situation surrounding the fired workers in the UK and internationally, once again claiming the 30+ staffers were let go not because they were trying to form a union, but because they were breaching company policy.

Specifically, Rockstar Games told GameSpot that the action was taken against the workers because they were discussing "specific game features from upcoming and unannounced titles" and other "confidential information" in a public forum.

Rockstar said this was "in breach of company policy and their legal obligations."

Continue Reading at GameSpot
title: Rockstar Insists GTA 6 Devs Were Fired For Leaks, Not Unionizing

description:
As it's routinely done with previous games in the series, The Pokemon Company is giving away a variety of freebies for Pokemon Legends: Z-A. These in-game goodies range from helpful items to elusive Mega Stones that can't otherwise be acquired, making it worthwhile to snag them while you can.

Most of the free items can be downloaded via Mystery Gift, a function that you'll automatically unlock after the first time you speak with Mable at the Pokemon Research Lab, roughly one hour into the adventure. However, the freebies are typically only available for a limited time, so you'll want to claim them as soon as possible.

Here's a roundup of all the free Mystery Gifts available right now for Pokemon Legends: Z-A, along with instructions on how to claim each of them. With the launch of the game's
title: All Free Mystery Gifts In Pokemon Legends: Z-A

description:
For the past two decades, the Call of Duty titles have almost always been the US's top-selling games of the year. But it looks like Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 is experiencing a marked decline in sales from its predecessor, Call of Duty: Black Ops 6.

According to GamesIndustry.biz, Alinea Analytics' data indicates that Black Ops 7 sold 401,000 copies on Steam in the first 26 days after its launch. By comparison, Black Ops 6 sold 2.3 million copies in the same time period in 2024. Call of Duty games have historically sold fewer copies on Steam than on consoles,
title: Call Of Duty: Black Ops 7 Sales Were Significantly Down From Black Ops 6 - Report

description:
Fallout fans have been understandably curious about the future of the franchise, especially since Fallout 5 isn't expected to arrive before The Elder Scrolls 6, and Bethesda hasn't been very forthcoming about when that game is coming either. For now, Bethesda's Todd Howard is keeping the company's plans close to his vest, but he has indicated there's more happening with Fallout than any other Bethesda property at the moment.

"We've had a long-term plan for Fallout, and so I wish I could talk about all those today," Howard told
title: Fallout Is The Franchise That Bethesda Is "Doing The Most In" Right Now
8BitDo Ultimate 2 Honkai: Star Rail Controller Bundle Is On Sale At Amazon

description:
The Safehouse in the Hills update in GTA Online has also been called the "Mansion Update," and it's easy to see why. The update has introduced full-fledged mansions into Los Santos, allowing you to live life like Michael and Franklin from the story mode of GTA V. You can even access a new Michael mission in the Safehouse in the Hills update, if you've been missing the aging fella.

Between completing missions in Safehouse in the Hills, though, you might be curious about acquiring and customizing your mansion in GTA Online. Below, you can see a full rundown of how the mansions work in Los Santos.

How to buy a Mansion in GTA Online

To purchase one of the new mansions in GTA Online, you'll have to visit a specific website on your phone, and you'll need quite a large sum of money. Mansions can be purchased by visiting the Prix Lux
title: How to Buy A Mansion In GTA Online And All Customization Options

description:
The wait for The Elder Scrolls 6 has been long, and fans are eager for any sign of progress--and don't expect any sort of announcement this holiday season. However, that excitement only grew when Bethesda released a live-action comedy trailer to celebrate Skyrim's sudden launch on the Nintendo Switch 2. The trailer features a mischievous Santa and two elves, and at first glance, it seems like simple holiday fun. But the numbers shown on the elves' character screen quickly caught the community's attention.

The reason: One elf's speech skill jumps to 27, while their overall level is shown moving toward 20. Some fans believe these numbers are a deliberate hint that The Elder Scrolls 6 is planned for 2027. Supporters of the theo
title: Fans Think A Skyrim Trailer Might Secretly Reveal Elder Scrolls 6's Release Year

description:
Developer Aspyr Media announced that Deus Ex Remastered has been delayed (seemingly indefinitely) so the team can "deliver the best possible experience."

Aspyr delivered the news on X, posting that, alongside a commitment to delivering the best possible experience, the team wants to meet the expectations of its fanbase.

Thank you to the community for your feedback following the reveal of Deus Ex Remastered. We've listened to what you said, and in order to better meet fan expectations and deliver the best possible experience for players, Deus Ex Remastered will no longer launch on Feb. 5, 2026. pic.twitter.com/NhalyPLm8q

— Aspyr (@AspyrMe
title: Deus Ex Remastered Delayed To "Better Meet Fan Expectations"

description:
The recent A Safehouse in the Hills update for GTA Online may contain clues about Grand Theft Auto VI, or at least that's what the franchise's passionate fanbase is theorizing based on some recent discoveries.

After the big new update went live on December 10, people dug into the game's code in search of anything that might provide clues about GTA 6, and people think they found some. A line of text that was discovered references a voice line for the character Jimmy, the son of main character Michael, that says he is "moving out of state." Another line, from his mother Amanda, says, "Our son is finally moving away from home." People are taking this to suggest th
title: GTA 6 Clues May Be Hidden In GTA Online's Big New Update, Fans Think

description:
Back in the day, Fortnite Season 7 brought us Fortnite's first real end-of-year holiday event, and so it's nice that we get to enjoy Fortnite OG's version of Season 7 at the same time of year. Especially given the new biome that just appeared on the island.

While the season changeovers in Chapter 1 didn't usually come with major renovations the way new seasons do these days. But that changed in Season 7, when a huge iceberg crashed into the southwestern corner of the island and made the island significantly larger, while adding a frigid snow biome in the process.

The result is the addition of three entirely new named locations, the destruction of two existing ones, and snowy makeovers for several of the spots in that part of the map that stuck around. Not everything that was added in the original Season 7 came back in exactly the same way, though. The Block,
title: Fortnite OG Season 7: All Map Changes And New Wrinkles

description:
Bigfoot isn't a myth. It's real, and it's really wandering around the forests ... in Fortnite, as a new update added the mythical sasquatch to the battle royale shooter.

Thanks to a recent 39.10 update that landed on December 11, players noticed something strange in Fortnite's woods. Apparently, Epic Games introduced Bigfoot to the game's sprawling world, but it isn't easy to find. Bigfoot roams the entire map, meaning it could appear by the Fore Fields, near the Humble Hills, and anywhere in between. It's also immune to damage, so shooting it means nothing. And if you get within 35 meters, it vanishes, leaving you on yet another wild sasquatch hunt before getting blasted to death.
title: Finally, Bigfoot Has Been Spotted For Real ... In Fortnite

description:
A new report detailed how much it costs for developers to have their games shown off at The Game Awards. Kotaku reported that a 60-second trailer can cost up to $450,000, with the price scaling to $1 million for a three-minute trailer.

The ad sales team for The Game Awards can charge that much due in part to the show's massive scale. The Game Awards 2024 drew an audience of 154 million livestreams, which was up from 118 million for The Game Awards 2023. This counts streams on YouTube, Twitch, Steam, TikTok, X, Instagram, Facebook, and international platforms like Bilibili and WeChat in China, among other sources.

The viewership number for The Game Awards 2024 was many millions higher than the latest Super Bowl (127.7 million), but the comparison is not apples to apples
title: Here's How Much It Could Cost To Show A Game At The Game Awards

description:
Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 has been one of 2025's breakout success stories in gaming, and it was developed on a relatively small budget, apparently.

The New York Times reports that the budget was "less than $10 million," crediting the information to developer Sandfall. The report added that the team "conserved resources" by purposefully avoiding an open-world setup in favor of making Expedition 33 a turn-based game.

Sandfall's Guillaume Broche said Sandfall now has the right technology to "make those games with a relatively small team," and he hopes to see more like it from other studios.

Continue Reading at GameSpot
title: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 Budget Was Remarkably Small - Report

description:
Helldivers 2 has been one of the big live service success stories of 2025, but there may be a new way to play the multiplayer title in the future. Arrowhead Game Studios CCO and Helldivers 2 creative director Johan Pilestedt has revealed that there is a prototype version of a roguelite mode, and he hinted that it brings some big changes to the game.

Pilestedt shared the news while replying to a message on social media, adding that "It changes the game fundamentally!"

Hey! We have a prototype of a rogue-lite mode - it changes the game fundementally!

— Pilestedt (@Pilestedt) December 10, 2025
title: Helldivers 2 Could Be Getting A Roguelite Mode

description:
Just one day after Bethesda released The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim on the Nintendo Switch 2, the publisher admitted the new version has performance problems. Players called the port a "disaster," and many more reported major input lag and a locked 30 frames per second.

Over on Reddit, the details of the lag became apparent when someone posted the delay between moving the Joy-Con stick and his character reacting in the game. "There's like a whole second between me flicking the stick and my character moving its he
title: Skyrim's Switch 2 Port Has A Bit Of A Performance Issue

description:
Well, this is different. Season 7 of Fortnite OG kicked off on Thursday with a new OG pass--but unlike previous OG passes, half of this one is time-gated until January 9. As frustrating as that may seem, it could mean that this OG Pass will have more skins than these usually do.

There are three skins in the part of the Season 7 OG pass that we can see, and judging by the ones Epic picked, it wouldn't be surprising at all if there were additional skins later. This first part of the OG pass includes three remixes of skins from the Chapter 1 Season 7 battle pass--Voidwalker Lynx is unlocked instantly with a purchase of the pass, and you can earn Lt. Winter and Wonder Onesie by leveling up. Wonder Onesie has the most customization options of any OG pass skin thus far, as you can decorate her with any of the sprays or emoticons you have in your locker.

No
title: Fortnite OG Pass Season 7: All Skins And Other Rewards

description:
Maybe as a holiday treat, Nintendo has added a new GameCube title for Nintendo Switch Online + Expansion Pack subscribers out of the blue. Wario World is now playable for the service on Switch 2.

Originally released in 2003, Wario World is a 3D platformer that sees the antihero looking for payback after his treasure is stolen and his castle destroyed. Coincidentally, Treasure is the developer behind the GameCube title. The studio is known for Gunstar Heroes, Sin and Punishment, and Ikaruga.

Wario World brings the GameCube library up to seven t
title: Wah! A New GameCube Game Just Surprise-Released On Switch 2

description:
Bethesda's RPG The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim has been released on so many platforms over the years since its 2011 debut that one developer at Bethesda believes it's becoming something of a joke.

Bethesda's Matt Carofano, the creative director for the just-released Switch 2 Anniversary Edition of Skyrim, told Nintendo Life that, "It's a bit of a joke at this point how often we release Skyrim."

Carofano said Skyrim is a "great game" and the goal in releasing the game in so many places is to help it reach more people "in the best way possible."

Continue Reading at G
title: Skyrim's Many Re-Releases Have Become "A Bit Of A Joke," Dev Says

description:
Ahead of The Game Awards, a trailer for the new James Bond game 007: First Light has leaked, revealing what appears to be the game's main villain and the actor playing him. The character is reportedly named Bawma and he will be played by Lenny Kravitz, according to the trailer leak.

Kravitz is best known for his success in music, but he does have acting experience as well, appearing in The Hunger Games movies as Cinna. He also acts in his many music videos.

Actor Patrick Gibson plays a young James Bond in First Light, which tells a new, original story of how Bond became 007. The game's cast also includes No Time To Die actor Priyanga Burford as M, The Walki
title: The Villain In 007 First Light May Be Played By Someone Totally Unexpected
Xbox Fallout Pip-Boy Controller Is Now Available To Preorder

description:
The Game Awards are set to kick off on December 11 at 4:30 PM PT / 7:30 PM ET, and it's sure to come with some surprise announcements and premieres that we may or may not have predicted well. With the nominations and the snubs revealed, here's a rundown on where you can stream Geoff Keighley's annual show.

  • Where to watch The Game Awards?

title: The Game Awards 2025: How To Watch, Start Times, And What To Expect
